project.name: Eve Backend Schema's MatchingRule Registry API
project.shortDescription: Eve Backend Schema's MatchingRule Registry API
project.description: Eve's backend subsystem contains several components to manage schema objects. One of those components is a OID to MatchingRule registry. The registry has methods for looking up matchingRules based on an OID and methods for registering matchingRules with their IANA assigned OID numbers.
